name: DoHots
description: In this game you can invite more than 10 different virtual partners (bots) and play virtual date with them using more than 20 different love positions animated in detail using more than 250 animations. The partners are based on 4 different body types (3 women and 1 man) and are customized with hairstyles, skin colors and exciting clothes. Your player's character can be customized too, there are more than 180 clothes, jewelry, tattoos and body options like hairstyle and skin color. All the models are highly detailed from head to toe and use industry leading lifelike graphics. You get 3 nice locations to play on. All locations are highly detailed and lifelike equipped, displayed with stunning lifelike graphics.
